MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH52 postcode area of Broxburn. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:50pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on the underground cable network and require our specialist team to assist to locate and repair the fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:43 PM on Wednesday, 06 January 2021.
